explanation: The Indian National Congress (INC) was founded in 1885 by Allan Octavian Hume along with other prominent leaders of that time, making it one of the oldest political parties in India. Currently, many Members of Parliament for Karnataka are associated with the INC, including figures like L. Hanumanthaiah, Syed Naseer Hussain, G. C. Chandrasekhar, and Jairam Ramesh, indicating their affiliation with this party founded by Hume.
